      RotatedRectangle ConnectedComponent.calculateOrientatedBoundingBox()

    • Uses of RotatedRectangle in org.openimaj.math.geometry.shape.util

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static RotatedRectangle RotatingCalipers.getMinimumBoundingRectangle(Polygon poly, boolean assumeSimple)
      Use the rotating calipers algorithm to optimally find the minimum sized rotated rectangle that encompasses the outer shell of the given polygon.
